extension.name: Jmodules LikeBox
extension.author: Sean Casco
extension.description: Jmodules LikeBox a facebook fanpage/profile/group box to display your fans on your joomla Site!

field.name: link_to_page
field.label: FB Page Link
field.description: Here input the link of the facebook page or other you want to show in the likebox ex. http://www.facebook.com/joomla

field.name: include_stream
field.label: Include Stream
field.description: Include or not the stream of latest posts from your Facebook Page.

field.name: boxcolor
field.label: Color
field.description: Color chooser from facebook api dark or light

field.name: fbheader
field.label: FanBox Header
field.description: Show Header Image for find us of Like box if fans or stream is enabled

field.name: fbborder
field.label: Box Border Color
field.description: Put the border color in hex ex 000000 or ffffff without the #

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix for the CSS class of the module.

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Selection of cache of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: Time before the module is recached
